name: Pummeling Bully

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Improved Reposition, Improved Trip, Improved Unarmed Strike, Pummeling Style; base attack bonus +9, brawler level 5th, or monk level 5th.

sections.text: When you use Pummeling Style to make an entire full attack or flurry of blows against a single target, if you hit with any of your attacks, you can attempt a reposition or trip combat maneuver check as a free action.
sections.name: Benefits

prerequisites: Improved Reposition, Improved Trip, Improved Unarmed Strike, Pummeling Style
base attack bonus +9, brawler level 5th, or monk level 5th
description: Your combo has the chance to trip or move your target.
